instruction2: Copy the meta tag below and add it within your website's HEAD tag.
instruction4: Inform your client that you already made the update to the website.
areYouSureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this site? You will lose all the data associated with this site.
pasteContents: Paste the contents into an email and send it to your web developer's email address.
notSure: Not sure how to do it?
doTheFollowing: If for some reason, you can't follow the steps above, do the following:

detail.label: Fill in site information
detail.description: Add the name and url of your site to start the process.

howToSetup.headline: How to add site
howToSetup.subHeadline: Watch this video to see how to install the meta tag onto your site.

siteRecrawlFeatureNotAvailableSubheading: You cannot recrawl this site right now apparently because this site is currently unverified. Go back to Sites page and reverify this site. This button will be re-enabled once the site becomes verified again.

deleteSite.headline: Delete Site
deleteSite.subHeading: Are you sure you want to delete this site? You will lose all the data associated with this site. You can't undo this action.
